description: Winter is a beautiful time of year, but it can also be long and brutal. If you're looking for a way to combat the&nbsp;winter blues, look no further than this fantastic Long Winter's Nap cocktail recipe!
keywords: A Long Winter's Nap Cocktail Recipe
How To A Long Winter's Nap
name: A Long Winter's Nap
recipeIngredient: ½ cup Maple syrup infused with cardamom, star anise, ginger, and a few optional Douglas fir twigs

recipeInstructions.name: Place maple syrup and water in a small pot. Add ginger and whole spices. Heat over medium heat and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes on low heat. Let sit for 10 minutes. You could let this sit overnight or strain it right away.
